title: MiG-29 Fulcrum
notes: Started two quick missions, flew around and game looked very stable. There is no hardware rendered (requires 3DFX's glide), so software rendered only. Windowed and full screen mode worked. Did not try multiplayer.
Runs using default graphics settings at 1024x768; played with Xbox 360 wired controller & keyboard; did not play online missions.
title: MiG-29 Fulcrum
